'''"Scions of the Canopy" Reputation EXP''' can be acquired by completing the [[Scions of the Canopy]] [[Tribal Chronicles]], [[World Quest]]s and [[Exploration]] in the [[Coatepec Mountain]], and various [[Bounty|Bounties]] and [[Supply Notice]]s for the ''Scions of the Canopy''.
